title: Mario Mandzukic is NOT training with Juventus as Manchester United's January pursuit gathers pace
text:
Mario Mandzukic is not training with his Juventus team-mates as per an agreement with the club, manager Maurizio Sarri has announced.

Mandzukic is yet to make an appearance for Juventus this season, and it now seems his time at the club is coming to an abrupt end - with Manchester United close to sealing a deal for him to move in the January transfer window.

Sarri, who replaced Massimiliano Allegri as manager in the summer, said he is open to the Croat's situation changing, but it has emerged that the striker doesn't see his team-mates or attend video analysis and tactical sessions with club staff.

Mario Mandzukic is heading for the exit door at Juventus and could be coming to England

Sarri announced Mandzukic's isolation on Friday though said the situation could change

Mandzukic at home: not only does he train apart but he doesn't attend video meetings and technical lessons with Sarri and staff. He's at Continassa but never together with his teammates, everything in agreement with the club. [@ChriTravaini] — Juvefc.com (@juvefcdotcom) October 18, 2019

Speaking at his pre-match press conference before Juve's game against Bologna on Saturday, Sarri said: 'Mandzukic is not training with us, in agreement with the club.

'If the agreement changes, I am open to everything.'

A move to Manchester would be made all the more likely should former Juventus manager Allegri take over from Ole Gunnar Solskjaer at Old Trafford.

According to reports from Italian outlet Tuttosport, Allegri is already in discussions with United over a £6.5million deal to replace Solskjaer.

The Italian has a strong working relationship with Mandzukic, having signed him for Juventus in 2015, and heaped praise on the Croatian striker in a recent interview with Polish outlet Przeglad Sportowy.

Former Juventus manager Max Allegri is a frontrunner for the Manchester United job

'Mandzukic is a special player for me. He gave amazing room for manoeuvre. Great footballer.

'He often changed clubs, so he had difficult patches. But he stayed at Juventus for five years. This is one of my biggest successes.'

Mandzukic is one of six names on United's January wishlist, with the club also interested in Moussa Dembele, Saul Niguez and James Maddison.
description: Mandzukic is yet to make an appearance for Juventus this season, and it now seems his time at the club is coming to an abrupt end - with Manchester United close to sealing a deal for him.
